name: Shell Wars
description:
A multiplayer created as part of the mastered live creator challenge. Using photon network to allow players to choose a name, create rooms and join a random room or see list of current room.  Up to 4 players per room, free for all where the first player to 6 kills wins.

Feedback Form (No emails saved)

https://forms.gle/9vv49iN71qxA7QHC9
